text: Minutes 0–5: Fast opening passage. Redchester win first duel in midfield and force Blueport to play long repeatedly. Arjun Rao (10) attempts early vertical passes; 4 passes attempted, 3 successful. Team territorial map shows Redchester spending most of this mini-window in Blueport's half.

metadata.image_alt: Basic football pitch diagram useful as a background for micro heatmaps.

text: Minutes 5–10: Redchester probe down the right flank. Right-back overlaps twice, enabling a cross into the box that causes a scramble. Leo Mendes (9) records two penalty-area touches but no clean shot. Defensive duels won by Blueport full-back interrupt the sequence.

metadata.image_alt: Football pitch template to overlay attack-right sequences.

text: Minutes 10–15: Intense pressing from Redchester starts to produce turnovers in final third. Two turnovers inside Blueport half result in low-xG shots. Arjun Rao completes an incisive pass that breaks the first defensive line (1 progressive pass this window).

metadata.image_alt: Pressure diagram — concept visual useful for illustrating pressing/pressure ideas.

text: Minutes 15–20: Blueport adjust by staying slightly wider; Marco Silva (7) receives more isolations on the right. He completes 2 successful dribbles and forces a Redchester wing-back to commit, which opens interior passing lanes.

metadata.image_alt: Pitch template for showing wide-player touches and dribble corridors.

text: Minutes 20–25: Transitional moments dominate. Redchester convert a turnover to a quick 3-pass sequence. Leo Mendes (9) times a diagonal run behind the defence (1 through ball / 1 xG chance). Blueport start to drop their wingers to nullify space in behind.

metadata.image_alt: mplsoccer gallery — examples of heatmaps/shotmaps you can reproduce for this micro-window.

text: Minutes 25–30: Pressing pays off: Redchester win ball high and create a cutback; shot saved. Pressing success rate measured at ~38% in this block. Arjun Rao influences play by dropping between lines (2 key passes in this period).

metadata.image_alt: Pressure concept diagram illustrating pressing success and recovered turnovers.

text: Minutes 30–35: Blueport grow into the game — longer possession sequences and 2 chances from crosses. Centre-forward Diego Costa wins an aerial duel and forces a save. Redchester's midfield distance between lines increases slightly, allowing Blueport to work the ball through midfield.

metadata.image_alt: Pitch background for showing aerial duel locations and cross entry points.

text: Minutes 35–40: Transitional period; Arjun Rao attempts long-range strike that hits crossbar (xG 0.07). Blueport attempt to exploit spaces on counter; full-backs take more risks overlapping into final third.

metadata.image_alt: mplsoccer gallery showing heatmap/shot timeline visualizations useful for this event.

text: Minutes 40–45: Late half flurry: Blueport win a corner that produces a headed on-target shot. Redchester remain compact centrally but concede more set-piece threats. No scoring events; tactical notes indicate Blueport success when crossing from right flank.

metadata.image_alt: Pitch diagram — good to overlay corner threat polygons and aerial duel markers.

text: Minutes 45–50: Early second half: Redchester restart energetic, registering two early progressive carries. Leo Mendes times a run in the 48th minute that opens the defence; assist follows two minutes later from Arjun Rao leading to a goal (goal at 50').

metadata.image_alt: mplsoccer examples showing pass network / goal-sequence plots to recreate the 9-pass move and goal.

text: Minutes 50–55: After goal, Redchester hold more possession. Ravi Iyer (6) increases ball recoveries and breaks up counters (3 tackles, 1 interception this window). Blueport attempt to push fullbacks higher to generate width.

metadata.image_alt: Pitch template for possession and interception visual overlays.

text: Minutes 55–60: Redchester control tempo and limit Blueport to low-xG attempts. Arjun Rao's sprint count begins to reduce; coaching note flags potential late substitution around minute 70 if fatigue persists.

metadata.image_alt: Pressure concept visual to illustrate changing pressing intensity and fatigue.
